```{r setup, include=FALSE}
## Load library
library(data.table)
library(ST.auto.1)
library(rmarkdown)
library(knitr)
library(DT)
## Set knitr options
opts_chunk$set(
	fig.width = 10,
	fig.height = 6,
	echo = FALSE,
	warning = FALSE
)
```



TO analyse individual models copy the model name 
```{r}
model_list<- c("DR~avg_oil_pri_barrel_lag_3+avg_oil_pri_barrel_lag_2","DR~avg_oil_pri_barrel_lag_2")

        
```



```{r test-child, echo=FALSE}
out = NULL
counter <- 0
for (i in model_list) {
  counter <- counter + 1 ;
  out = c(out, knit_expand('ReportDetails.Rmd'))
}

```

`r paste(knit(text = out), collapse = '\n')`
